QuestData.Title: Murloc Mania
QuestData.Description:
I'm glad you made it out in one piece.
Judging by the nearby shipwrecks, I think it's safe to say the missing expedition ran aground here, too.
We can't move until we've got the remaining survivors back on their feet.
Unfortunately, our remaining supplies have been stolen by murlocs! Annoying little pests...
I need you to recover enough first aid supplies for the wounded.
Then we can begin searching for the missing expedition.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Murlocs have stolen crucial first aid supplies!
QuestData.LogDescription: Recover $1oa First Aid Kits from Murlocs.
QuestData.CompletionText: Did you recover the first aid kits? Don't take the murlocs lightly.
QuestData.RewardText: Excellent work. Let's get the survivors back on their feet.

Objectives.Objective: First Aid Kits recovered from defeated Murlocs
